solution_line_template: The total amount of money saved is ${saved_march} + ${saved_april} + ${saved_may} = $<<{saved_march}+{saved_april}+{saved_may}={total_saved}>>{total_saved}.
The total cost of the two products is ${cost_keyboard} + ${cost_mouse} = $<<{cost_keyboard}+{cost_mouse}={total_spent}>>{total_spent}.
